plot: A man with the power to inspire or corrupt must choose a fate for a withering villain on a murderous rampage to reclaim what was once his.
title: The Box of Sergius
plot_es: A man with the power to inspire or corrupt must choose a fate for a withering villain on a murderous rampage to reclaim what was once his.
plot_en: A man with the power to inspire or corrupt must choose a fate for a withering villain on a murderous rampage to reclaim what was once his.
